description: This source file defines a React component named ExportPdfButton that provides a button to trigger exporting a specified DOM element or selector to a PDF file. It handles user interaction, element resolution, and invokes utility functions for PDF generation.

methods.name: ExportPdfButton
methods.description: React functional component that renders a button which, when clicked, exports a specified element or selector to a PDF file, with callback handling for export completion.
